description: Obtains directory limit information for the current Region.

nested_items.name: DirectoryLimits
nested_items.description: A  DirectoryLimits object that contains the directory limits for the current Region.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyDirectoriesLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of cloud directories allowed in the Region.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyDirectoriesCurrentCount
nested_items.description: The current number of cloud directories in the Region.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyDirectoriesLimitReached
nested_items.description: Indicates if the cloud directory limit has been reached.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyMicrosoftADLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of Managed Microsoft AD directories allowed in the region.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyMicrosoftADCurrentCount
nested_items.description: The current number of Managed Microsoft AD directories in the region.

nested_items.name: CloudOnlyMicrosoftADLimitReached
nested_items.description: Indicates if the Managed Microsoft AD directory limit has been reached.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDirectoriesLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of connected directories allowed in the Region.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDirectoriesCurrentCount
nested_items.description: The current number of connected directories in the Region.

nested_items.name: ConnectedDirectoriesLimitReached
nested_items.description: Indicates if the connected directory limit has been reached.
